title: Why People Kill - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/5/20
itunes:title: Why People Kill - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/5/20
description:
George Noory and forensic psychologist Ellery Kane explore her work analyzing prisoners who are up for parole, finding their motives to commit murder, and whether they can be reformed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
